document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Fortress Street in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Fortress Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Fortress Street''' was a large road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Fortress Street was found within north Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. It stretched across the entire expanse of the northern part of the city, running roughly parallel to the exterior city wall. Fortress Street originated at a major intersection in front of the [[Trail Gate]] in the west and terminated in front of the [[Dragon Gate]] in the east. Along the way it was intersected by many other streets including [[Wyvern Road]], [[Nool Street]], [[Cobble Road]], [[Warrior Street]], [[Goblin Way]], [[Wizards' Way]], [[Electrum Avenue]], [[Ghost Street]], [[Brass Street]], and the [[Street of Dragons]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] armory was located on Fortress Street near the Dragon Gate.
